definition: lying beyond what is openly revealed or avowed (especially being kept in the background or deliberately concealed)
details:
adjective
- lying beyond what is openly revealed or avowed (especially being kept in the background or deliberately concealed)
= example: lying beyond what is openly revealed or avowed (especially being kept in the background or deliberately concealed)
= synonyms: ulterior
- being or operating under the surface of the earth
= example: being or operating under the surface of the earth
= synonyms: subterraneous
